dct_title_s: Virginiae Partis Australis, et Floridae Partis Orientalis, Interjacentiumq Regionum Nova Descriptio
dct_description_sm: Hackerman Collection #08. Description from Mapping Maryland: "This work of Willem Blaeu, the most notable Dutch cartographer of the seventeenth century is known for its accuracy and high aesthetic value. Note that the Chesapeake Bay has evolved from a small bay to its proper size as a large estuary." 1 map hand colored; 38 x 49 cm.; Scale: approximately 1:2,300,000. Descriptive text in Latin on verso.
